verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; A Psalm of David, a Song. Let God <WH430> arise <WH6965>, let his enemies <WH341> be scattered <WH6327>; Let them also that hate <WH8130> him flee <WH5127> before him <WH6440>.

As smoke <WH6227> is driven away <WH5086>, so drive them away <WH5086>: As wax <WH1749> melteth <WH4549> before <WH6440> the fire <WH784>, So let the wicked <WH7563> perish <WH6> at the presence <WH6440> of God <WH430>.
But let the righteous <WH6662> be glad <WH8055>; let them exult <WH5970> before <WH6440> God <WH430>: Yea <WH5970>, let them rejoice with gladness <WH8057>.

Sing <WH7891> unto God <WH430>, sing praises <WH2167> to his name <WH8034>: Cast up a highway <WH5549> for him that rideth <WH7392> through the deserts <WH6160>; His name <WH8034> is Jehovah <WH3050>; and exult <WH5937> ye before him <WH6440>.
A father <WH1> of the fatherless <WH3490>, and a judge <WH1781> of the widows <WH490>, Is God <WH430> in his holy <WH6944> habitation <WH4583>.

God <WH430> setteth <WH3427> the solitary <WH3173> in families <WH1004>: He bringeth out <WH3318> the prisoners <WH615> into prosperity <WH3574>; But the rebellious <WH5637> dwell <WH7931> in a parched land <WH6707>.
O God <WH430>, when thou wentest forth <WH3318> before <WH6440> thy people <WH5971>, When thou didst march <WH6805> through the wilderness <WH3452>; <WH5542>[[Selah

The earth <WH776> trembled <WH7493>, The heavens <WH8064> also dropped <WH5197> rain at the presence <WH6440> of God <WH430>: Yon <WH2088> Sinai <WH5514> trembled at the presence <WH6440> of God <WH430>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>.
Thou <WH430>, O God, didst send <WH5130> a plentiful <WH5071> rain <WH1653>, Thou didst confirm <WH3559> thine inheritance <WH5159>, when it was weary <WH3811>.
Thy congregation <WH2416> dwelt <WH3427> therein <WH430>: Thou, O God, didst prepare <WH3559> of thy goodness <WH2896> for the poor <WH6041>.
The Lord <WH136> giveth <WH5414> the word <WH562>: The women that publish <WH1319> the tidings are a great <WH7227> host <WH6635>.
Kings <WH4428> of armies <WH6635> flee <WH5074>, they flee <WH5074>; And she that tarrieth <WH5116> at home <WH1004> divideth <WH2505> the spoil <WH7998>.
When ye lie <WH7901> among the sheepfolds <WH8240>, It is as the wings <WH3671> of a dove <WH3123> covered <WH2645> with silver <WH3701>, And her pinions <WH3671> with yellow <WH3422> gold <WH2742>.
When the Almighty <WH7706> scattered <WH6566> kings <WH4428> therein <WH7949>, It was as when it snoweth in Zalmon <WH6756>.
A mountain <WH2022> of God <WH430> is the mountain <WH2022> of Bashan <WH1316>; A high <WH1386> mountain <WH2022> is the mountain <WH2022> of Bashan <WH1316>.

Why look <WH7520> ye askance <WH1386>, ye high mountains <WH2022>, At the mountain <WH2022> which God <WH430> hath desired <WH2530> for his abode <WH3427>? Yea <WH3068>, Jehovah will dwell <WH7931> in it for ever <WH5331>.
The chariots <WH7393> of God <WH430> are twenty thousand <WH7239>, even thousands <WH505> upon thousands <WH8136>; The Lord <WH136> is among them <WH5514>, as in Sinai, in the sanctuary <WH6944>.

Thou hast ascended <WH5927> on high <WH4791>, thou hast led away <WH7628> captives <WH7628>; Thou hast received <WH3947> gifts <WH4979> among men <WH120>, Yea <WH5637>, among the rebellious also <WH3050>, that Jehovah God <WH430> might dwell with them <WH7931>.
Blessed <WH1288> be the Lord <WH136>, who daily <WH3117> beareth <WH6006> our burden <WH410>, Even the God who is our salvation <WH3444>. <WH5542>[[Selah
God <WH410> is unto us a God <WH410> of deliverances <WH4190>; And unto Jehovah <WH136> the Lord <WH136> belongeth escape <WH8444> from death <WH4194>.
But God <WH430> will smite <WH4272> through the head <WH7218> of his enemies <WH341>, The hairy <WH8181> scalp <WH6936> of such a one as goeth on still <WH1980> in his guiltiness <WH817>.
The Lord <WH136> said <WH559>, I will bring again <WH7725> from Bashan <WH1316>, I will bring them again <WH7725> from the depths <WH4688> of the sea <WH3220>;
That thou mayest crush them <WH4272>, dipping thy foot <WH7272> in blood <WH1818>, That the tongue <WH3956> of thy dogs <WH3611> may have its portion from thine enemies <WH341>.
They have seen <WH7200> thy goings <WH1979>, O God <WH430>, Even the goings <WH1979> of my God <WH410>, my King <WH4428>, into the sanctuary <WH6944>.
The singers <WH7891> went before <WH6923>, the minstrels <WH5059> followed after <WH310>, In the midst <WH8432> of the damsels <WH5959> playing with timbrels <WH8608>.
Bless <WH1288> ye God <WH430> in the congregations <WH4721>, Even the Lord <WH136>, ye that are of the fountain <WH4726> of Israel <WH3478>.

There is little <WH6810> Benjamin <WH1144> their ruler <WH7287>, The princes <WH8269> of Judah <WH3063> and their council <WH7277>, The princes <WH8269> of Zebulun <WH2074>, the princes <WH8269> of Naphtali <WH5321>.
Thy God <WH430> hath commanded <WH6680> thy strength <WH5797>: Strengthen <WH5810>, O God <WH430>, that which <WH2098> thou hast wrought for us <WH6466>.
Because of thy temple <WH1964> at Jerusalem <WH3389> Kings <WH4428> shall bring <WH2986> presents unto thee <WH7862>.

Rebuke <WH1605> the wild beast <WH2416> of the reeds <WH7070>, The multitude <WH2416> of the bulls <WH47>, with the calves <WH5695> of the peoples <WH5971>, Trampling under foot <WH7511> the pieces <WH7518> of silver <WH3701>: He hath scattered <WH967> the peoples <WH5971> that delight <WH2654> in war <WH7128>.
Princes <WH2831> shall come out <WH857> of Egypt <WH4714>; Ethiopia <WH3568> shall haste to stretch out <WH7323> her hands <WH3027> unto God <WH430>.
Sing <WH7891> unto God <WH430>, ye kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth <WH776>; Oh sing praises <WH2167> unto the Lord <WH136>; <WH5542>[[Selah
To him that rideth <WH7392> upon the heaven <WH8064> of heavens <WH8064>, which are of old <WH6924>; Lo <WH5414>, he uttereth his voice <WH6963>, a mighty <WH5797> voice <WH6963>.
Ascribe <WH5414> ye strength <WH5797> unto God <WH430>: His excellency <WH1346> is over Israel <WH3478>, And his strength <WH5797> is in the skies <WH7834>.

O God <WH430>, thou art terrible <WH3372> out of thy holy places <WH4720>: The God <WH410> of Israel <WH3478>, he giveth <WH5414> strength <WH5797> and power <WH5797> unto his people <WH5971>. Blessed <WH1288> be God <WH430>.
